question: Which organisation appoints Suresh Sethi as its MD & CEO?
explanation: India Post Payments Bank (IPPB) appointed Mr. Suresh Sethi, the former MD of Vodafone M-Pesa Ltd. as its Managing Director & Chief Executive Officer. Mr. Sethi takes over from the dynamic leadership of Mr. A.P. Singh who had been the interim MD & CEO of IPPB since January 2017.
